long_description: An ecologically responsible alternative to disposable chemical glow sticks, the Nite Ize Clip-on Safety Marker is a handy way to create flexible, 2-sided illumination almost anywhere. Flexible polymer strip is encased in lightweight, durable nylon fabric. Decorated with a reflective pattern for extra visibility; illuminated on both sides by an efficient LED and powered by an easy-to-replace 2032 battery (included). Light, thin and weather-resistant plastic S-Biner Clip attaches to almost anything with a hook or ring-from zippers and tent lines to belt loops and bicycle seats. Double-gated S-Biner clip on the opposite end lets you clip it to itself and create a loop of light to wear on your wrist, or wrap around anything up to 3 in. in diameter. Bright red LED has 2 modes to choose from: steady glow or continuous flash. Perfect for creating safety visibility in any situation. 100-hour battery life. The Nite Ize Clip-on Safety Marker measures 10.31 x 1.44 x 0.35 in.
short_description: An ecologically responsible alternative to disposable chemical glow sticks, the Nite Ize Clip-on Safety Marker is a handy way to create flexible, 2-sided illumination almost anywhere.
